attributes.action: recommend the granting of an award to the town of Wootton Bassett.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The town of Wootton Bassett in Wiltshire has represented the people in honouring the memory of those members of the armed forces who have been repatriated from areas of conflict.   They have shown the values of honour and integrity.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
